headline: MetLife Declares Fourth Quarter 2025 Common Stock Dividend
summary: NEW YORK, October 07, 2025--MetLife, Inc. (NYSE: MET) today announced that its board of directors has declared a fourth quarter 2025 common stock dividend of $0.5675 per share. The dividend will be payable on Dec. 9, 2025, to shareholders of record as of Nov. 4, 2025.

raw.headline: MetLife Declares Fourth Quarter 2025 Common Stock Dividend
raw.summary: NEW YORK, October 07, 2025--MetLife, Inc. (NYSE: MET) today announced that its board of directors has declared a fourth quarter 2025 common stock dividend of $0.5675 per share. The dividend will be payable on Dec. 9, 2025, to shareholders of record as of Nov. 4, 2025.

headline: Macroeconomic Conditions Continue to Drive Pension Risk Transfer
summary: NEW YORK, October 07, 2025--Amid ongoing market conditions and economic uncertainty, U.S. plan sponsors are moving decisively to reduce pension risk. According to the newly released MetLife’s 2025 Pension Risk Transfer (PRT) Poll, a record 94% of defined benefit (DB) pension plan sponsors with de-risking goals intend to fully divest their pension liabilities with 80% planning to do so within five years.
